notes.text:
An update for webkit2gtk3 is now available for Red Hat Enterprise Linux 8.

Red Hat Product Security has rated this update as having a security impact of Important. A Common Vulnerability Scoring System (CVSS) base score, which gives a detailed severity rating, is available for each vulnerability from the CVE link(s) in the References section.
notes.title: Topic

notes.text:
WebKitGTK is the port of the portable web rendering engine WebKit to the GTK
platform.

Security Fix(es):

* webkitgtk: processing maliciously crafted web content may be exploited for arbitrary code execution (CVE-2023-23529)

For more details about the security issue(s), including the impact, a CVSS score, acknowledgments, and other related information, refer to the CVE page(s) listed in the References section.
notes.title: Details

cwe.name: Improper Restriction of Operations within the Bounds of a Memory Buffer

notes.text: A vulnerability was found in WebKitGTK. This issue occurs when processing maliciously crafted web content in WebKit. This may, in theory, allow a remote attacker to create a specially crafted web page, trick the victim into opening it, trigger type confusion, and execute arbitrary code on the target system.
notes.title: Vulnerability description

notes.text: webkitgtk: processing maliciously crafted web content may be exploited for arbitrary code execution
notes.title: Vulnerability summary

notes.text: Red Hat is not aware of any exploitation of this flaw in Linux platforms at this time.
notes.title: Statement

notes.text: The CVSS score(s) listed for this vulnerability do not reflect the associated product's status, and are included for informational purposes to better understand the severity of this vulnerability.
notes.title: CVSS score applicability

remediations.details:
For details on how to apply this update, which includes the changes described in this advisory, refer to:

https://access.redhat.com/articles/11258
Setting the environment variable JSC_useDFGJIT=0 will mitigate this issue.

vulnerabilities.title: webkitgtk: processing maliciously crafted web content may be exploited for arbitrary code execution
